verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H4192>Muthlabben,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> I will <S%H5608>show<s%> forth <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> works.
I will be <S%H8056>glad<s%> and <S%H5970>rejoice<s%> in you: I will sing praise to your <S%H8034>name,<s%> O you <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>High.<s%>
When my <S%H341>enemies<s%> are <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H268>back,<s%> they shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> and <S%H6>perish<s%> at your <S%H6440>presence.<s%>
For you have <S%H6213>maintained<s%> my <S%H4941>right<s%> and my <S%H1779>cause;<s%> you <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H8199>judging<s%> <S%H6664>right.<s%>

You have <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> you have <S%H6>destroyed<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> you have <S%H4229>put<s%> out their <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

O you <S%H341>enemy,<s%> <S%H2723>destructions<s%> are come to a <S%H5331>perpetual<s%> <S%H8552>end:<s%> and you have <S%H5428>destroyed<s%> <S%H5892>cities;<s%> their <S%H2143>memorial<s%> is <S%H6>perished<s%> with them.
But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3427>endure<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> he has <S%H3559>prepared<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
And he shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> he shall <S%H1777>minister<s%> <S%H1777>judgment<s%> to the <S%H3816>people<s%> in <S%H4339>uprightness.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also will be a <S%H4869>refuge<s%> for the <S%H1790>oppressed,<s%> a <S%H4869>refuge<s%> in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>
And they that <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> will put their <S%H982>trust<s%> in you: for you, <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> have not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> them that <S%H1875>seek<s%> you.
Sing praises to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> his <S%H5949>doings.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> he makes <S%H1875>inquisition<s%> for <S%H1818>blood,<s%> he <S%H2142>remembers<s%> them: he <S%H7911>forgets<s%> not the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H6041>humble.<s%>

Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on me, O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H7200>consider<s%> my <S%H6040>trouble<s%> which I suffer of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, you that <S%H7311>lift<s%> me up from the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death:<s%>

That I may <S%H5608>show<s%> forth <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> I will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

The <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are <S%H2883>sunk<s%> down in the <S%H7845>pit<s%> that they <S%H6213>made:<s%> in the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> they <S%H2934>hid<s%> is their own <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H3920>taken.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> by the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> which he <S%H6213>executes:<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5367>snared<s%> in the <S%H6467>work<s%> of his own <S%H3709>hands.<s%> <S%H1902>Higgaion.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7725>turned<s%> into <S%H7585>hell,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H7913>forget<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
For the <S%H34>needy<s%> shall not <S%H5331>always<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten:<s%> the <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H6035>poor<s%> <S%H6041><s%> shall not <S%H6>perish<s%> for <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> let not <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H5810>prevail:<s%> let the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> be <S%H8199>judged<s%> in your <S%H6440>sight.<s%>
<S%H7896>Put<s%> them in <S%H4172>fear,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> that the <S%H1471>nations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> themselves to be but <S%H582>men.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
